Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, take care!<sp:5:0:0> Let's keep our goodbyes
short so a monster doesn't surprise us.
Talk23_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>On second thought, you deserve more
than that. <sp:5:0:0>Here!
Moon_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Tonight is a red moon! At last...<sp:5:0:0>
A <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>!

Hurry!<sp:5:0:0> I want to observe the blood moon
from a better vantage point.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, I'm off!<sp:5:0:0> I don't want to stick around
for a monster to catch me.
Moon_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight the moon begins to wane...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> The moon's fullness may now be
receding, but I find her no less beautiful.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, you'll have to excuse me!<sp:5:0:0> It seems
dangerous to stick around, don't
you think?
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You might be wondering how I got here.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>A fine question!<sp:5:0:0> To explain, I must tell you
about...<sp:5:0:0>the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>!

Some nights, no matter the moon's phase,
it rises full and red. Precisely at midnight,
the whole sky turns crimson.
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL>And then...<sp:5:1:0>defeated monsters appear
again!<sp:5:1:0> There you have it.

<sp:0:2:2:7d00>The <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>It is my life's work to research this event.
Why do the monsters revive?<sp:5:0:0> What
connects them to the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>?
I thought if I studied the monsters'
ecology, I would discover something...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I got too close, and here I am.
Moon_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight is the third-quarter moon...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> Are you lonely, my moon, with only
half of yourself for company?
Talk18:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Hm...<sp:5:0:0> Your pouch is full.


In that case, why don't you just take
this instead?
Moon_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight is a waning crescent moon...


Mmm. <sp:5:0:0>The new moon will be here
tomorrow.<sp:5:0:0> I must admit, it breaks my
heart to say goodbye to each old moon.
Moon_Full:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>Tonight is a full moon...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> I can feel the moonlight pouring
down, cleansing my spirit...
Moon_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight is a new moon...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> The new moon is hesitant to show
herself. Perhaps she's shy?
BloodyTalk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Tired><clr:0000>It...<sp:5:0:0>it's here!<sp:5:0:0> Can you feel it?! <sp:5:0:0>This is it!<sp:5:1:0>
<snd:LaughL_00>THE BLOOD MOON!<clr:ffff>
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Please, take this for saving me.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Hm...<sp:5:0:0> I was about to give you an elixir
made of monster parts, but it appears
your pouch is full.
Why don't you just take this instead?
Moon_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight is a crescent moon...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> A golden arc through the sky...<sp:5:0:0>
She's beautiful, isn't she?
BloodyTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Tired><clr:0000>The...the crimson moon! It's calling!
<snd:LaughL_00>It's calling meee!<clr:ffff>
Moon_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight is a first-quarter moon...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> Doesn't she look like a celestial
bow, eager to shoot the sun?<sp:5:0:0>
What courage.
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I found that stunning ore on the very day
you rescued me. <sp:5:0:0>Oh, how it sparkled!

I was keeping it as a good luck charm,
but now I leave it with you.
Moon_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Tonight is the 13th-day moon...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> She grows larger every day on her
path to fullness.
Moon_After:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think_00>Last night was amazing, wasn't it?
The moon was so red and beautiful...

<sp:3:0:2:0801>It makes me feel alive!<sp:5:0:0> What could cause
such a remarkable phenomenon?

There are still so many mysteries to solve.
I will eagerly await the blood moon's
next visit.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:WorkHeavy>No... <sp:5:0:0>That's not enough to properly
convey my gratitude! <sp:5:0:0>Here!
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh...<sp:5:0:0> Did I fill up your pouch?


I was going to give you another one, but...<sp:5:1:0>
please, take this instead.
BloodyTalk_06: <snd:Sad_01>Here...<sp:5:1:0> For setting me free...<sp:5:0:0> Take it!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Hmmm...<sp:5:1:0> I could have sworn I'd escaped.
I suppose that was just a momentary
delusion. Alas!
Say, you there.<sp:5:0:0> Would you mind breaking
me out of this cell?
Moon_Before:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Tonight's moon...<sp:5:0:0> I have a feeling that it
might be red!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>So please hurry up. <sp:5:0:0>This is a terrible spot
for me to conduct my observations.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Thank you! I'm saved!<sp:5:0:0> I despaired thinking
no one would find me here!
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You might be wondering how I got here.


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>A fine question!<sp:5:0:0> To explain, I must tell you
about...<sp:5:0:0>the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>!

Some nights, no matter the moon's phase,
it rises full and red. Precisely at midnight,
the whole sky turns crimson.
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL>And then...<sp:5:1:0>defeated monsters appear
again!<sp:5:1:0> There you have it.

<sp:0:2:2:7d00>The <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>It is my life's work to research this event.
Why do the monsters revive?<sp:5:0:0> What
connects them to the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>?
I thought if I studied the monsters'
ecology, I would discover something...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I got too close, and here I am.
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You saved me again!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The sky turning red... Slain monsters
returning to life...

I want to unravel the mysteries of the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Unfortunately, going to the
moon to investigate has proven difficult.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That being the case, I decided to research
by closely observing the monsters in their
natural habitat.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>But it looks like I got too close!<sp:5:0:0> Again!
Moon_Rain_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>Rain tonight...


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> Whenever the moon is hidden,
I don't feel like myself.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>Phew! Thank you for rescuing me. <sp:5:0:0>Again!


<sp:3:0:2:0501>I'm sorry this keeps happening. But when
I dig into a mystery, I just can't let go.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Why do the monsters revive when the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> rises...

I'll do whatever it takes to figure it out.
And if that means sneaking into their dens
again<sp:5:0:0> and again<sp:5:0:0> and again...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ahem.<sp:5:0:0> But it looks like I wasn't as careful
as I thought.
Moon_Rain_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Do you think we'll see the moon tonight?


Mmm.<sp:5:0:0> I hope this rain lets up soon.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>*sigh* You saved me.<sp:5:1:0> Again.<sp:3:0:2:0501> No, I'm
grateful. Really!

<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> You think there's something I might
be missing?

<sp:3:0:2:0401>Hmm...<sp:5:0:0> Let me think...


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, the biggest monster seemed to be
in charge...<sp:5:0:0> That's about it.

<sp:0:2:2:5000>But that doesn't get me any closer to understanding
the blood moon.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0101>In any case, I'm saved! Thanks...<sp:5:0:0>again.
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Notice>I knew you would come!


You dispatch the monsters with such
impressive skill.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's just...once the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff> rises,
they'll all come back.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Monsters...<sp:5:1:0> What in the world are they?
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Ease>Thank you, thank you!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I had no idea how I would escape this—
What would you call it? A monster fort?

I thought I was destined for a monstrous
cook pot. I had almost given up hope!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Huh...<snd:QuestionNormal> What do monsters eat, anyway? Could be
worth investigating...

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy><sp:0:2:2:6400>In any case,<sp:5:0:0> I can't thank you enough!<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I knew it!<sp:5:0:0> I just knew you'd rescue me!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>You have my endless thanks...again.<sp:5:1:0>
And— Oh! I just realized something!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>With your assistance,<sp:5:0:0> I can devote
myself to researching the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>
without fear.
It doesn't matter how many times I'm
captured and rescued...

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:LaughS_01>I'll never give up!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>So keep up the good work.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>And for your invaluable assistance with
my research...

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Take this as a token of my
heartfelt thanks.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, I'm sure we'll meet again.<sp:5:0:0> Now
quick, let's split up before a monster
spots us!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, until next time.<sp:5:0:0> I'm getting out of
here before the monsters come back!
Talk24_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:WorkHeavy>No! <sp:5:0:0>I can't insult you with that pathetically
small show of thanks! <sp:5:0:0>Take this too!
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, goodbye!<sp:5:0:0> Let's disappear before a
monster notices us.
